quote: Sculpt my body into what you see in your mind … into what you desire. Paint me with marks, bruises and bites. Please, Damon, do whatever you crave … what you need to keep only wanting me.
quote_letters: SCULPT MY BODY INTO WHAT YOU SEE IN YOUR MIND  INTO WHAT YOU DESIRE PAINT ME WITH MARKS BRUISES AND BITES PLEASE DAMON DO WHATEVER YOU CRAVE  WHAT YOU NEED TO KEEP ONLY WANTING ME
